name: Nesting | Ludem Dare 52
description:
NESTING

Created for Ludem Dare 52  Compo- 

Theme: "Harvest"

This was my first larger Pico8 project and was quite fun to create. Lost the theme a bit during development but was having far too much fun with my character controller to pivot.

Ran out of time for music or vfx but I'm happy with how this turned out.

P.S. You can easily soft-lock yourself. if you run out of twigs on the map, please reset the cartridge and play again.
